card_obj.name: Shadowborn Demon
card_obj.text:
Flying
When Shadowborn Demon enters the battlefield, destroy target non-Demon creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are fewer than six creature cards in your graveyard, sacrifice a creature.

card_obj.name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
card_obj.text:
Swampwalk
At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card_obj.name: Laboratory Maniac
card_obj.text: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

editions.flavor: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

card_edition.flavor: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

card_obj.name: Chasm Skulker
card_obj.text:
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Chasm Skulker.
When Chasm Skulker dies, put X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk onto the battlefield, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Chasm Skulker. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

editions.flavor: Designed by Mike Neumann

card_edition.flavor: Designed by Mike Neumann

card_obj.name: Séance
card_obj.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that card except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card_obj.name: Séance
card_obj.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that card except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card_obj.name: Mercurial Pretender
card_obj.text: You may have Mercurial Pretender enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature you control except it gains "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand."

editions.flavor: The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.
The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.

card_edition.flavor: The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.

card_obj.name: Hunter's Prowess
card_obj.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

editions.flavor: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

card_edition.flavor: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

card_obj.name: Resolute Archangel
card_obj.text:
Flying
When Resolute Archangel enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than your starting life total, it becomes equal to your starting life total.

editions.flavor: Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.
Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.

card_edition.flavor: Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.

card_obj.name: Rune-Scarred Demon
card_obj.text:
Flying
When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

card_edition.flavor: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

card_obj.name: Hedron Crab
card_obj.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor: Hedrons perplex minds both great and small.

card_edition.flavor: Hedrons perplex minds both great and small.

card_obj.name: Quickling
card_obj.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Quickling enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

card_obj.name: Treasured Find
card_obj.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.

card_obj.name: Rescue from the Underworld
card_obj.text:
As an additional cost to cast Rescue from the Underworld, sacrifice a creature.
Choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card and the sacrificed card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rescue from the Underworld.

card_obj.name: Rescue from the Underworld
card_obj.text:

Choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card and the sacrificed card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rescue from the Underworld.

card_obj.name: Sultai Soothsayer
card_obj.text: When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: The naga of the Sultai Brood made deals with dark forces to keep their power.

card_edition.flavor: The naga of the Sultai Brood made deals with dark forces to keep their power.

card_obj.name: Think Twice
card_obj.text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

editions.flavor:
"Great books are meant to be read, then read again backwards or upside down!"
—Ettovard, Tolarian archivist
"Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

card_edition.flavor: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

card_obj.name: Satyr Wayfinder
card_obj.text: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.
